purpose: Configures a Raspberry Pi display machine with i3wm, auto-starting browser and terminal.
integration_points: Auto-starts Chromium browser and Alacritty terminal with bottom
notes: This module configures a display machine on Raspberry Pi 4, importing i3wm and browsers environments. It sets up SD image, VPN, user services for browser and terminal auto-start, hardware overlays for 3D acceleration, PipeWire audio, and networking. The terminal service runs bottom system monitor. Reasoning: Designed for a kiosk-like display setup with graphical interface, remote access via VPN, and automatic application launching.
